name: Jackie Chan Adventures Season 5
name_cn: 成龙历险记 第五季
summary: The Chans are caught in the middle of a race against time as Future Jade battles Shendu's son Drago in order to prevent him from getting the Dragon Teeth and reviving his father. Managing to thwart Drago's plan they imprison the mini-demon in Section 13. After the completion of the Oni Mask quest, Drago breaks out of Section 13 and targets mystical items imbued with the demon chi of his aunts and uncles; the Eight Demon Sorcerers. StrikeMaster Ice and his crew make a re-appearance and are recruited by Drago.
